Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Emergency lighting system failure. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Emergency Power component.
Inspection revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 07/02/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
